import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Content({ candidate1, candidate2, currentAccount, vote, votingstat, resultStat }) { const [selectedCandidate, setSelectedCandidate] = useState(); const handleSelect = (e) => { setSelectedCandidate(e.target.value); console.log(selectedCandidate) } console.log(votingstat) const handleSubmit = (e) => { if ([candidate1.id, candidate2.id].includes(selectedCandidate)) { vote(Number(selectedCandidate)); } else { alert('Error in Vote Submission'); } } return (

Voting id : {currentAccount}

{resultStat ? (votingstat ?

You have voted

Thank you for voting
:

Caste your Vote

) : <>

Results are Declared

Vote Count

# Name Votes
1 {candidate1.name} {candidate1.votecount}
2 {candidate2.name} {candidate2.votecount}

{candidate1.votecount > candidate2.votecount ? candidate1.name : candidate2.name} won the Election

}
); }
